special_text:
[+1]: Until end of turn, Delia Bladeheart becomes a 3/1 Goblin Ally creature with haste and indestructible that’s still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to her this turn.
[0]: Create a 1/1 white Ally creature token.
[-3]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +1/+0.”
